description: Graph RAG traversal for vector store.

embedding_model.info: Specify the Embedding Model. Not required for Astra Vectorize collections.

edge_definition.info: Edge definition for the graph traversal.

graphrag_strategy_kwargs.info: Optional dictionary of additional parameters for the retrieval strategy. Please see https://datastax.github.io/graph-rag/reference/graph_retriever/strategies/ for details.
